description: This file defines the MenuFragment class for an Android app, responsible for displaying menu items for a restaurant, filtering by categories, and handling cart interactions.

classes.name: MenuFragment
classes.description: An Android Fragment responsible for displaying a restaurant's menu, filtering items by category, and managing interactions with the cart.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the adapter and retrieves the restaurant ID from arguments.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes UI components, sets up the restaurant data, recycler view, category filtering, and observes cart changes.

methods.name: setupCategoryChips
methods.description: Creates category filter chips dynamically and sets their interaction handlers.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Factory method to instantiate MenuFragment with a specific restaurant ID.
